So, you don’t want to become

a doctor?

No.

So what do you

want to do?

Um, I’m

still…

You mean you haven’t even thought about

what you want to do

in the future?

…

If you don’t want
to be a doctor,
then become an Anglican priest.

Huh?

The Anglican Church is not even our family’s denomination.

Anglican

priests enjoy

hunting and

mingling with the middle and upper classes, so you

should feel right

at home.
